comment._content: Scottish title: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Duke_of_Roxburghe Judging by the dates, it is probably this fellow: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henry_Innes-Ker,_8th_Duke_of_Roxburghe

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Looks like it must be Henry Innes-Ker, 8th Duke of Roxburghe (1876-1932). en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henry_Innes-Ker,_8th_Duke_of_Roxburghe

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called ANYTHING GOES SCOTLAND,VINTAGE PHOTOS,POSTCARDS,EPHEMERAetc..., and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment._content:
Harry Angstrom and pennylrichardsca:

Thanks for the information! It seems quite likely this is Henry Innes-Ker, 8th Duke of Roxburghe, so we'll make an addition to our catalog record when we update.
